Rent this gorgeous rowhome on Madison Square, one of Philadelphia's unique and coveted "Garden Blocks". This newly renovated home is situated in the heart of Graduate Hospital and is a short walking distance to Center City, Philadelphia's central business district. Looking for a luxury apartment in the heart of Philadelphia? A blend of vintage charm and modern comfort, The Franklin Residences offers one and two bedroom apartments in Philadelphia, PA, with an unparalleled lifestyle. Live in a historic building with contemporary amenities, centrally located in Washington Square West, offering the best of Philly footsteps from your front door. The Franklin Residences is an iconic high-rise in Philadelphia with a rich history that has been transformed into a luxury apartment community with unparalleled conveniences. Have the best of both worlds – historic charm and modern living in Center City, Philadelphia, apartments today! Formerly known as the Benjamin Franklin Hotel, the Franklin Residences transports you to a different time once you step inside. Our community is also pet-friendly, and your furry companions will feel right at home with nearby green space and pet-themed resident events like Yappy Hours. description:
Welcome to 1705 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new 2021 full gut-rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. With construction finalized in 2021, these brand-new units offer high-end appliances, plenty of closet space, and lovely views. With seven (7) available units, there are a variety of floorplans available for those seeking either a studio or 1-bedroom. You won’t have to worry about laundry, as each apartment has access to laundry on the first floor and some select floor-plans offer an in-unit washer/dryer! The bathroom includes a shower/tub combo, new vanity, and gorgeous modern tiling. The bedroom offers a comfortable space, lots of natural lighting, and a nicely sized closet. This 1-bed, 1-bath is offered at $1,395 a month, plus the cost of utilities. Located right outside the unit is the communal laundry, where two (2) sets of free washers and dryers are found for the tenant’s convenience.

title: Start this winter in a Philadelphia Chapter Landmark Property!
description:
Start this winter in a Philadelphia Chapter Landmark Property originally designed in 1951! Enter through the spacious remodeled lobby where you are greeted by a 24-hour front desk attendant. The property features a fitness center on the lower level along with common areas where you can relax and watch TV or catch up with friends with a game of pool. There's also a place to store your bike in the designated bike room. Looking for outdoor space? There's a roof deck that offers panoramic views of the city! The views are simply breathtaking! This large north facing one bedroom has beautiful hardwood parquet floors and a view you will LOVE! The living area and bedrooms are spacious and have tons of closet space. Monthly rent includes gas. SUPER Pet Friendly!! Come see what all the buzz is about at The Parkway House and everything that living in the Art Museum area has to offer!! ***Pictures featured are of the new model unit.***
2201 Pennsylvania Ave #711

title: This lovely, 2-story home located in the heart of Fishtown
description:
Available March 1, 2023: This lovely, 2-story home located in the heart of Fishtown is just around the corner from endless options for dining, shopping and entertainment. Easy commute anywhere in the city and quick access to major roads and highways. This home offers a beautiful, private, brick patio that is great for entertaining all year long. The home offers a charming interior with original hardwood floors throughout, updated kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and rustic wooden cabinetry. The second floor opens up into a spacious landing, which could serve as a home office, dressing room, or sitting room. This leads to the bedroom and bathroom. title: Pet friendly Furnished Apartment on Farm
description:
This is a very special and loved one bedroom apartment on a quaint Collegeville Farm. Perfect for those wanting to be in somewhere very safe, beautiful, peaceful and in nature... but still close to places like Norristown, Phoenixville and Philly.
Unfortunately, I'm moving in with my partner so need a bigger space.. Otherwise I would not be leaving. I'm looking for someone to take over the last 7-8 Months of my lease, ending in October. It would be an easy process.
This apartment literally has everything you could possibly need. It comes all included with furniture, kitchen and bathroom supplies, sheets and towels, laundry, washer dryer, heated floors, etc. It's perfect for those moving from another state, like I did.
The farm is perfect, with the cutest animals you'll come to love. There are two pigs, chickens, and more. All very loved.
The landlords are very kind and always greet you with a friendly hello.
The rent is 2100 all included(wifi, electricity, furniture, everything)! No jokes.
It is Pet friendly, although there is a pet fee.There is also a charge for monthly housecleaning.
Shoot me a text or send me an email introducing yourself and we can set up an in person or virtual tour.
Move in date negotiable.
How landlord describes the apartment:
"FURNISHED APARTMENT, PETS WELCOME!-
THE HEARTHSIDE" IS A TASTEFULLY DECORATED ONE-BEDROOM APARTMENT IN A COLONIAL FARMHOUSE. It features a delightful sunroom and the original colonial walk-in fireplace. description: * Welcome to 2155 E Letterly Street, a 3 bed, 1 bath corner-lot townhome with tons of character in a fantastic Olde Richmond location! Upon entering the home, you are greeted with a unique tiled front vestibule that leads to the large, open living area with hardwood flooring, plenty of natural light and a charming archway. Towards the rear of the first floor, you are sure to love the kitchen where old meets new with a retro tiled floor, stylish floating shelves, and modern stainless steel appliances. You also can access a private rear patio for relaxing in the warmer months, or your basement where the washer and dryer are located. Upstairs find three generously sized bedrooms with hardwood flooring as well as a hall bath featuring a tiled shower/tub and classic pedestal sink. Located on a quaint, residential block yet right by Frankford Ave and many great attractions like Philadelphia Brewing Co., Martha Kensington, Riverwards Produce Market and so much more! Also a short distance to I-95 for traveling in and out of the city as well as plenty of public transportation routes. *Pets permitted with owner approval. $500 refundable pet deposit per pet required
